document_data.name: Twice as Nice
document_data.mainbody: '''Twice as Nice''' was a shop in the [[Sea Ward of Waterdeep|Sea Ward]] of [[Waterdeep]].
document_data.Structure: Located off the [[Street of Lances]], the building was in a constant state of disrepair. In the basement, there was a wooden door leading to a gate to [[Wyllowwood]] in [[Undermountain]].
